title: Clarendon Library
address: 2035 Nostrand Ave. Brooklyn, NY 11210
closingmsg:
Interruption of Bookmobile Service:

Bookmobile Service at the Clarendon Library has been cancelled today, Tuesday, October 29, 2019. We apologize for any inconvenience.

 

Starting Saturday, August 3, 2019 the Clarendon Library will close for installation of new shelving, cabinets and minor repair work.  The branch will reopen in late November or early December 2019.  

 

 

Bookmobile service begins August 6, 2019 and will be available on Tuesdays and Fridays from 11 am to 4 pm.  The bookmobile will be located in front of the branch on Nostrand Avenue.

 

Please join us for Saturday Story Times! 

Location: Vanderveer United Methodist Church    3114 Glenwood Rd, Brooklyn NY, 11210     Time: 11:00-12:00                        Dates:  Starting Satuday's: 9/7/19, 9/21/19, 10/5/19, 10/26/19, 11/9/19, 11/16/19,    Last Day 11/30/19                                                                                                                                                                                                                        

We also encourage you to visit nearby BPL branches for programming and holds.

The neighborhood libraries closest to you are:

 

Cortelyou Library

1305 Cortelyou Road

Brooklyn, NY  11226

718.693.7763

 

Flatbush Library

22 Linden Boulvard

Brooklyn, NY  11226

718.856.0813

 

Kensington Library

4207 18th Avenue

Brooklyn, NY  11218

718.436.0545

 

Midwood Library

975 East 16th Street

Brooklyn, NY  11230

718.252.0967

 

Questions?  Call 718.230.2100.

We appreciate your patience and look forward to seeing you again at Clarendon Library in Winter 2019.

title: East Flatbush Library
address: 9612 Church Ave. at. Rockaway Pkwy. Brooklyn, NY 11212
closingmsg:
The East Flatbush Library currently closed for a comprehensive renovation. Bookmobile service will be available on Mondays and Wednesdays at the start of business on Monday, September 24th, 2018 and will continue until the renovation project is complete. The renovated branch will offer an all-new, light-filled space with modern shelving and furniture, a new community meeting space and a welcoming children's area.

Bookmobile Hours:

Monday 11:00am-4:00pm

Wednesday 11:00am-4:00pm

title: Greenpoint Library
address: 107 Norman Ave. at Leonard St. Brooklyn, NY 11222
closingmsg:
On July 1, 2017 Greenpoint Library closed for rebuild. The new Greenpoint Library & Environmental Education Center is expected to open in early 2020.
 

Bookmobile service will be provided near Greenpoint Library on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 11am to 4pm.

A pop-up library is available at the Park Church Co-Op (129 Russell St.) for browsing and borrowing during the following times:

Mondays & Tuesdays 11am-4pm

First Saturday of each month 10am-1pm
Sundays 12pm-3pm with a Sunday Storytime at 12:30pm

title: Sheepshead Bay Library
address: 2636 E. 14th St. at Ave. Z Brooklyn, NY 11235
closingmsg:
Starting Saturday, August 3, 2019 the Sheepshead Bay Library will close for installation of new shelving, new cabinets , flooring work and minor repairs.  The branch will reopen in late November or early December 2019. 

Bookmobile service begins August 5, 2019 and will be available on Mondays and Wednesdays from 11 am to 4 pm.  The bookmobile will be located in front of the branch on East 14th Street. 

Thursday, October 17 from 2pm - 7pm, meet with your Sheepshead Bay Library librarians at the  Sukkot street festival!Learn about library programs, and get your face painted. Design your very own balloon craft, and get a free, small gift from the library. East 14th Street between Avenue X and Avenue Y

We invite Russian Literature and poetry enthusiasts to join our monthly club of immigrant writers and poets! Our goal is to unite and support immigrant writers and poets and help them to be heard. Saturdays, October 26 and November 23 at Kings Highway library from 12 - 3 PM (This is a Russian language Program.) 

 

During this closure, please visit Brighton Beach, Gravesend, Homecrest and Kings Bay libraries for all your BPL needs.  

 

The neighborhood libraries closest to you are:

 Brighton Beach Library

 16 Brighton First Road

Brooklyn, NY 11235

718.946.2917

 

Gravesend Library

 301 Avenue X

 Brooklyn, NY 11223 

718.382.5792

 

Homecrest Library

2525 Coney Island Avenue

 Brooklyn, NY 11223

 718.382.5924

 

Kings Bay Library

 3650 Nostrand Avenue

 Brooklyn, NY 11229

718.368.1709

 

Questions?  Call 718.230.2100.

We appreciate your patience and look forward to seeing you again at Sheepshead Bay Library in Winter 2019.

title: Windsor Terrace Library
address: 160 E. 5th St. at Ft. Hamilton Pkwy. Brooklyn, NY 11218
closingmsg:
On Friday, February 1, Windsor Terrace Library closed for extensive HVAC replacement, an upgrade to the electrical systems (including several new wired tables!) and a cosmetic refresh of the interiors. The branch will reopen in 2020.

 

Bookmobile Service: The bookmobile is on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 11 am to 4 pm. During these days and times, you can also pick up holds from the bookmobile. When you place a hold online, simply select "Windsor Terrace Bookmobile" as your pick-up location. 

 

Children's Programming:  Toddler Time with Miss Cindy, Tuesdays at 10:30 a.m. at Church of the Holy Apostles.   Babies & Books, Thursdays at 10:30 at JCC Brooklyn Windsor Terrace.  

Senior Programming: more information to come.

 

We also encourage you to visit nearby BPL branches for programming and holds. The neighborhood libraries closest to you are: 


Cortelyou Library
1305 Cortelyou Road
Brooklyn, NY 11226
718.693.7763

Flatbush Library
22 Linden Boulevard
Brooklyn, NY 11226
718.856.0813

Kensington Library 
4207 18th Avenue
Brooklyn, NY 11218
718.436.0545

We appreciate your patience and look forward to seeing you again at Windsor Terrace Library in 2020.
